## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G23060](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G23060)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CaS</u>
- **Gene Name:** calcium sensing receptor
- **Description:**   calcium sensing receptor;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G23060.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G23060.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G23060.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G23060.2)
## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0000293](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0000293)&nbsp;---&nbsp;guard cell&nbsp;---&nbsp;célula guardiana (Spanish, exact), occlusive cell (exact), 孔辺細胞 (Japanese, exact)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS92951]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;ethanolamine-phosphate cytidylyltransferase activity is reduced to 74%. Seedling phosphatidylethanolamine content is reduced by 20%. Dwarf when grown at 8<sup>o</sup>C. Earlier senescence of cotyladons and mature leaves. Pale green and smaller seeds. Delay in embryo maturation. Reduced fertility.
## Function-related keywords:
   - [guard cell](/tags/guard-cell/)
